subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort in Rajasthan was built during the rule of Mughal Emperor Akbar?
question_hi: राजस्थान मुगल राजपुत्र Akbar के समय के द्वारा बनाया गया एक फोट कौन सी गढ़ी है ?
A_hi: अमेरिका राजपुत्र अखनिका के समय के विभाग में बनाया गया है ?
explanation_en: Nahargarh Fort, also known as Fort of the Dead, was built during the reign of Akbar the Great. It is situated in Jaipur city.

question_en: Which famous fort was built by Akbar the Great during his reign?
